com.smartitengineering.version.api
Interface Commit

All Known Subinterfaces:
MutableCommit
All Known Implementing Classes:
CommitImpl
public interface Commit

It represents a change in the system.

Author:
imyousuf

Method Summary
 Author getAuthor()
          Retrieves the Author of the commit.
 java.lang.String getCommitId()
          Retrieves the unique identifier for this commit
 java.lang.String getCommitMessage()
          Retrieve the commit log message for the change.
 java.util.Date getCommitTime()
          Retrieves the date-time stamp of when the commit was performed.
 java.lang.String getParentCommitId()
          Get the parent commit id of the current commit.
 java.util.Collection<Revision> getRevisions()
          Get the revisions that have changed in the commit.

Author getAuthor()
Retrieves the Author of the commit. It could be useful to check who has performed different updates to a set of resources
